# rechargepits

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of rechargepits is to model simple recharge geometries using the assumptions of the Green-Ampt equation. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of rechargepits from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("gopalpenny/rechargepits")
```

## Package website

For further information, see the package website on [github.io](https://gopalpenny.github.io/rechargepits/).
